8 rules to fix your bugs

21 Mar 2007

Me and Ivar just came up with a new way to attack bugs - we formed a fight club! You can join us if you follow the rules! 1st RULE: You do not talk about FIGHT CLUB. 2nd RULE: You DO NOT talk about FIGHT CLUB. 3rd RULE: If someone says "stop" or goes limp, taps out the bugfix is over. 4th RULE: Only two guys to a bugfix. 5th RULE: One bugfix at a time. 6th RULE: No shirts, no shoes. 7th RULE: Bugfixes will go on as long as they have to. 8th RULE: If this is your first night at FIGHT CLUB, you HAVE to fix bugs!

Ahti Kitsik
Java, Eclipse RCP, Python, Node.js, web apps developer
